Michael won... screw Sydney... Melbourne is a better place and the Second season should be there...

I retrieved my password just to say this.
Way to go spoiling the whole damn episode, spazz420.

You are correct BounceG, the name seems to be quite fitting...  

66 episodes in and this dolt decides to post a spoiler on the final episode.

THIS is why we can't have nice things....
I think Bunnings are very happy with their promotion in the show and on the website - esp considering Mitre10 has The Block - so I have little doubt there will be another season.

Good news guys mediaspy.org is reporting the following...

"Despite dire ratings for the series, Ten insists the programme will be back next year with a revamped format."

Stay tuned!
